Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Blaine Wastell, Prashant Bansode, Chaitanya Bijwe

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • .NET 2.0

Description

To protect database connection strings, store them inside the connectionStrings section in your configuration file and then use protected configuration to encrypt this section.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
